ProcessTemplates.Name: Workday simulated payload to Azure Entra ID user - processing
ProcessTemplates.Description:
This template process receives an HTTP request containing a simulated Workday employee payload and an action query parameter (e.g. create, update, or delete). 
Based on this input, it processes and sends a corresponding request to Azure Entra ID (formerly Azure Active Directory) to manage the user lifecycle accordingly.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"AzureEntraTokenUrl":{"Value":"\"https://login.microsoftonline.com/c9f7723b-79d4-4ad5-afe3-25e54980313c/oauth2/v2.0/token\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"URL used to get an Azure Entra ID (Azure AD) access token."},"ClientID":{"Value":"\"84348e2f-5e83-490d-99a6-c124a4e26283\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Public identifier of an application registered in Azure Entra ID (Azure AD) used to request tokens."},"ClientSecret":{"Value":"\"abc\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Confidential credential for the app in Azure Entra ID, used to securely authenticate when requesting tokens."},"EmailDomain":{"Value":"\"frendsworkforcetest.onmicrosoft.com\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Holds the domain part of the generated email address"}}

Process.Name: Workday simulated payload to Azure Entra ID user - processing
Process.Description:
This template process receives an HTTP request containing a simulated Workday employee payload and an action query parameter (e.g. create, update, or delete). 
Based on this input, it processes and sends a corresponding request to Azure Entra ID (formerly Azure Active Directory) to manage the user lifecycle accordingly.

3.0.1
info:
  title: Workday to Azure API
  description: 'Optional multiline or single-line description in [CommonMark](http://commonmark.org/help/) or HTML.'
  version: 0.0.1
servers:
  - url: /api/WorkdayToAzure/v1
    description: Workday to Azure API for a template.
paths:
  /employees:
    post:
      summary: 'Create, update or delete employee'
      description: Accepts employee details in nested Workday-like format wrapped in a 'Data' key
      parameters:
        - name: action
          in: query
          description: 'Action to perform, e.g., "create", "update" or "delete"'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              required:
                - Data
              type: object
              properties:
                Data:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    Employee:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        Employee_Data:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            Personal_Info_Data:
                              type: object
                              properties:
                                Person_Data:
                                  type: object
                                  properties:
                                    Name_Data:
                                      required:
                                        - First_Name
                                        - Last_Name
                                      type: object
                                      properties:
                                        First_Name:
                                          type: string
                                          example: Bob
                                        Last_Name:
                                          type: string
                                          example: Johnson
                                    Contact_Data:
                                      type: object
                                      properties:
                                        Street_Address:
                                          type: string
                                          example: 123 Main St
                                        City:
                                          type: string
                                          example: Chicago
                                        State:
                                          type: string
                                          example: Illinois
                                        Postal_Code:
                                          type: string
                                          example: '60601'
                                        Country:
                                          type: string
                                          example: USA
                                        Business_Phone:
                                          type: string
                                          example: (312) 555-0123
                                        Mobile_Phone:
                                          type: string
                                          example: (312) 555-9876
                            Worker_Position_Data:
                              required:
                                - Job_Title
                                - Department
                                - Employee_ID
                              type: object
                              properties:
                                Job_Title:
                                  type: string
                                  example: Marketing Manager
                                Department:
                                  type: string
                                  example: Marketing
                                Employee_ID:
                                  type: string
                                  example: '1'
                                Employee_Type:
                                  type: string
                                  nullable: true
                                  example: ''
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Employee data processed successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                    example: true
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: Employee record created/updated
        '400':
          description: ''
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: [ ]

    return #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Name_Data.First_Name + #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Name_Data.Last_Name + "@" + #var.EmailDomain;
}"},"shouldAssignVariable":{"mode":"toggle","value":true},"variableName":"EmailAddress"},"SelectedTypeId":null,"PromoteResultAs":null,"Name":"Assign EmailAddress","Description":null,"IsDefault":null,"ShouldRetry":null,"MaxRetryCount":null,"ShouldNotLogResult":null,"ShouldDispose":null},{"Id":"Activity_14oqbnn","Type":12,"Parameters":{"useStatementMode":{"mode":"toggle","value":true},"variableExpression":{"mode":"csharp","value":"{
    // Define required fields
    string firstName = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Name_Data.First_Name;
    string lastName = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Name_Data.Last_Name;
    string emailAddress = #var.EmailAddress;

    string mailNickname = (firstName + lastName).ToLower();


    // Define optional fields
    string jobTitle = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Worker_Position_Data.Job_Title;
    string department = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Worker_Position_Data.Department;
    string employeeId = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Worker_Position_Data.Employee_ID;
    string employeeType = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Worker_Position_Data.Employee_Type;

    string street = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Contact_Data.Street_Address;
    string city = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Contact_Data.City;
    string state = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Contact_Data.State;
    string postalCode = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Contact_Data.Postal_Code;
    string country = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Contact_Data.Country;
    string businessPhone = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Contact_Data.Business_Phone;
    string mobilePhone = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Contact_Data.Mobile_Phone;

    // Build the JSON manually as a string
    string json = "{";
    json += "\"accountEnabled\": true,";
    json += "\"displayName\": \"" + firstName + " " + lastName + "\",";
    json += "\"mailNickname\": \"" + mailNickname + "\",";
    json += "\"userPrincipalName\": \"" + emailAddress + "\",";
    json += "\"passwordProfile\": {\"forceChangePasswordNextSignIn\": true, \"password\": \"xWwvJ]6NMw+bWH-d\"},";
    json += "\"givenName\": \"" + firstName + "\",";
    json += "\"surname\": \"" + lastName + "\"";

    // Add optional fields only if not null or empty
    if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(jobTitle)) json += ",\"jobTitle\": \"" + jobTitle + "\"";
    if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(department)) json += ",\"department\": \"" + department + "\"";
    if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(employeeId)) json += ",\"employeeId\": \"" + employeeId + "\"";
    if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(employeeType)) json += ",\"employeeType\": \"" + employeeType + "\"";
    if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(street)) json += ",\"streetAddress\": \"" + street + "\"";
    if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(city)) json += ",\"city\": \"" + city + "\"";
    if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(state)) json += ",\"state\": \"" + state + "\"";
    if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(postalCode)) json += ",\"postalCode\": \"" + postalCode + "\"";
    if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(country)) json += ",\"country\": \"" + country + "\"";
    if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(businessPhone)) json += ",\"businessPhones\": [\"" + businessPhone + "\"]";
    if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(mobilePhone)) json += ",\"mobilePhone\": \"" + mobilePhone + "\"";

    json += "}";

    return json;
}
"},"shouldAssignVariable":{"mode":"toggle","value":true},"variableName":"CreateUserJson"},"SelectedTypeId":null,"PromoteResultAs":null,"Name":"Create User payload","Description":null,"IsDefault":null,"ShouldRetry":null,"MaxRetryCount":null,"ShouldNotLogResult":null,"ShouldDispose":null},{"Id":"Activity_0rkcpjo","Type":12,"Parameters":{"useStatementMode":{"mode":"toggle","value":true},"variableExpression":{"mode":"csharp","value":"{
    string firstName = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Name_Data.First_Name;
    string lastName = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Name_Data.Last_Name;

    string jobTitle = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Worker_Position_Data.Job_Title;
    string department = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Worker_Position_Data.Department;
    string employeeId = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Worker_Position_Data.Employee_ID;
    string employeeType = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Worker_Position_Data.Employee_Type;

    string street = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Contact_Data.Street_Address;
    string city = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Contact_Data.City;
    string state = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Contact_Data.State;
    string postalCode = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Contact_Data.Postal_Code;
    string country = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Contact_Data.Country;

    string businessPhone = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Contact_Data.Business_Phone;
    string mobilePhone = #trigger.data.body.Data.Employee.Employee_Data.Personal_Info_Data.Person_Data.Contact_Data.Mobile_Phone;

    string json = "{";

    bool first = true; // controls comma placement

    void AddField(string key, string value, bool isArray = false)
    {
        if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(value))
        {
            if (!first) json += ",";
            json += "\"" + key + "\": ";
            json += isArray ? "[\"" + value + "\"]" : "\"" + value + "\"";
            first = false;
        }
    }

    AddField("givenName", firstName);
    AddField("surname", lastName);
    AddField("jobTitle", jobTitle);
    AddField("department", department);
    AddField("employeeId", employeeId);
    AddField("employeeType", employeeType);
    AddField("streetAddress", street);
    AddField("city", city);
    AddField("state", state);
    AddField("postalCode", postalCode);
    AddField("country", country);
    AddField("businessPhones", businessPhone, true);
    AddField("mobilePhone", mobilePhone);

    json += "}";

    return json;
}
"},"shouldAssignVariable":{"mode":"toggle","value":true},"variableName":"UpdateUserJson"},"SelectedTypeId":null,"PromoteResultAs":null,"Name":"Update User payload","Description":null,"IsDefault":null,"ShouldRetry":null,"MaxRetryCount":null,"ShouldNotLogResult":null,"ShouldDispose":null}]

oyee.Employee_Data.Worker_Position_Data.Employee_Type","data.query.action"],"openApiDocument":"openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Workday to Azure API
  description: 'Optional multiline or single-line description in [CommonMark](http://commonmark.org/help/) or HTML.'
  version: 0.0.1
servers:
  - url: /api/WorkdayToAzure/v1
    description: Workday to Azure API for a template.
paths:
  /employees:
    post:
      summary: 'Create, update or delete employee'
      description: Accepts employee details in nested Workday-like format wrapped in a 'Data' key
      parameters:
        - name: action
          in: query
          description: 'Action to perform, e.g., "create", "update" or "delete"'
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              required:
                - Data
              type: object
              properties:
                Data:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    Employee:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        Employee_Data:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            Personal_Info_Data:
                              type: object
                              properties:
                                Person_Data:
                                  type: object
                                  properties:
                                    Name_Data:
                                      required:
                                        - First_Name
                                        - Last_Name
                                      type: object
                                      properties:
                                        First_Name:
                                          type: string
                                          example: Bob
                                        Last_Name:
                                          type: string
                                          example: Johnson
                                    Contact_Data:
                                      type: object
                                      properties:
                                        Street_Address:
                                          type: string
                                          example: 123 Main St
                                        City:
                                          type: string
                                          example: Chicago
                                        State:
                                          type: string
                                          example: Illinois
                                        Postal_Code:
                                          type: string
                                          example: '60601'
                                        Country:
                                          type: string
                                          example: USA
                                        Business_Phone:
                                          type: string
                                          example: (312) 555-0123
                                        Mobile_Phone:
                                          type: string
                                          example: (312) 555-9876
                            Worker_Position_Data:
                              required:
                                - Job_Title
                                - Department
                                - Employee_ID
                              type: object
                              properties:
                                Job_Title:
                                  type: string
                                  example: Marketing Manager
                                Department:
                                  type: string
                                  example: Marketing
                                Employee_ID:
                                  type: string
                                  example: '1'
                                Employee_Type:
                                  type: string
                                  nullable: true
                                  example: ''
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Employee data processed successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                    example: true
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: Employee record created/updated
        '400':
          description: ''
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: [ ]
components:
  securitySchemes:
    ApiKeyAuth:
      type: apiKey
      name: X-ApiKey
      in: header","basePath":"/api/WorkdayToAzure/v1","auth":"ApiPolicy"},"name":"/api/WorkdayToAzure/v1/employees","id":"StartEvent_927SES1O","shouldNotLogParameters":null}]
